import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user-component/user-model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-form', templateUrl: './user-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-form.component.css'] }) export class UserFormComponent { @Input() user!: User; constructor () { } }

Please provide a valid zip.
